name: Boost! (Smickal)
description:
Make sure to play the game in fullscreen.

How to play:

  1.  Press Space to boost the ship.
  2. Press A or D to rotate the ship.
  3. Avoid all obstacle .
  4. Land on the green landing zone.
  5. Have fun !

A game made simple 3D game made by Kevin Leonardrich (Smickal).
